column11: Review Text
Good to spend time with family. Life grads are there but they don't recommend bathing. Very large are to play.
Panadura beach is a nice place and it has kids playing area.But, on Sundays and Poya days its cowded.

One of large beach area in the vicinity...always crowded in weekends..dedicated area also available for children to play...Be mindful ti have sea bath only in safe areas marked by guards..Good placed to spend a weekend with children..
An amazing place to go fishing . This place is very beautiful during sunrise and sun set . A splendid view of a small light house and the railway makes it beautiful during the sunset .

Like beaches the world over this one is littered with rubbish. It would be helpful if hotel staff could at least keep their small bit of beach clear and clean. Sadly an indictment of the throw away society and a danger to marine life.

Nice sand beach but a lot of garbage on it. Panadura is special for the night market which is nice to see, but again nothing too special. I think we were the only tourists there so it's good place if you want to see true way of living Sri lanka people from the coast.
A lovely stretch of beach with golden sands, not too many seashells to accidentally step on and not too crowded.

The beach is miles of clean sand that is pretty much untouched by tourism Hard to fault a natural beach. Nothing else to do and too rough to swim in the sea Was lucky to watch about 50 local men bring in a fishing net, too them hours

Beach is really Wide and even spacy, but not suitable for a bath due to there is no system of Life Savers around and not shallow. Also not much facilities built around the place and locals crowd most of the time and hectic during holidays and weekends.

Hid panadura sandy long beach is ideal for locals and any foreigners. You can play any beach sport in there. There is a play area for kids. My kids love that area. Ideal for kits. Many people do swim. Some days crowded with local, especially in Sunday and saturday evening.

The place is really good for family to visit for evening seating with the sun, but the place is full of people on the weekends better to go on a weekday. beach is nice and can have a bath of sea water but beggars are available so watch out.
busy with locals and couples.not clean much.beach not maintained properly.anyway not much rough and safe for swimming.only problem is no-life grads near by.Public beach.
This beach is similar to Mount-Lavinia beach. But people are ruining this place by putting polythene s everywhere.But nice place to visit and enjoy.

Only down side is the cleanliness of the beach. Suitable for families too. There is a play area for kids as well. Swimming in the sea is not recommended. From 4pm to 6pm it has a nice view of the sun set.

Walking along the beach is something to do to feel the atmosphere of the country - loved it as you can see fisherman boats and local people around and also some cows who are savred animal - wild dogs around all a millions lose dogs in all the country - and off course some crabs if you look carefully

A relaxing beach to chill out and ideal for the family to spend the weekend.  Also nearby is the  Navro Beach Resort with a restaurant where you can enjoy a delectable kotthu meal, or snack with soft drinks and juices of your choice. The perfect getaway for the weekend where you can enjoy the scenery with loves ones or friends.

Panadura beach is a huge beach where mainly local people patronize to relax and play. large sandy beach comes to life during holidays with truckloads of people and vendors selling snacks & ice cream to street food. There is a secured play area for children. for those who desist streetfood ther is decent local resturant right infront of the beach. food is limited but whats available is good ( BBQ, kotthu and snacks etc.) place is clean

One of largest beach i have ever seen..but almost aways crowded..if you go during august you can see large number of kites flying in sky...Not recommend the place to have sea bath..however life guards too available in beach..little play area  too available for the childrens..

It was a nice place little while ago. But due to high crowed, place become dirty now. No maintenance can be seen by the municipal council. Kids play area use by the Adults Muslims and no one to stop those.

Panadura Beach is becoming slowly popular among tourist who loves beaches ,earlier only  locals visit this place or to have a dip in the sea , but now many tourist that comes to wadduaa and  panadura area are coming to the beach , to make it a safe place for bathing there is lifeguard station on the beach also. There are restaurant s in the beach and new ones are being developed around the beach as well children parks are also their
